name: Wicked Potions
description:
Audio can have issues in the browser. Please consider downloading a native build for a better experience.

Story

You are the owner of the "Wicked Potions" shop. As an evil witch you want to supply every wrongdoer with your potions.

Goal

Your goal is to brew as many potions as possible before there are no more valid moves. The ingredients needed for the potion you are currently brewing are displayed to the right of the ingredient shelf.

Match three or more ingredients of the same kind vertically or horizontally to collect them. You can switch the position of neighbouring ingredients as long as the switch creates a match.

Controls

  • Click on two neighbouring ingredients to try to switch their places
  • Press 'r' to give up and restart the game
